name: Unweave
script:
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then
   local Uaff = matches[3]
   local unweave = "unweaving"..matches[3]
   ak.psion.unweaving[Uaff] = ak.psion.unweaving[Uaff] + 1
	 OppGainedAff("Prone")
   OppGainedAff(unweave)
end
matches: ^You lash at ([\w'\-]+) with a translucent lash, directing the fundamental weave of (?:his|her) (mind|body|spirit) to begin unwinding\.$
